articles.title: CD Projekt Red Boss Downplays Cyberpunk 2077 Crunch, Then Apologizes - GameSpot
articles.description: CEO Adam Kicinski walked back recent comments about studio crunch, calling them "utterly bad."
articles.content: With Cyberpunk 2077 suffering a 21-day delay possibly due to the PS4 and Xbox One ports, issues with crunch have become a hot-button topic at Polish studio CD Projekt Red. On a recent investor's call… [+2662 chars]
